summary: The customer was having trouble activating their Contoso Wireless phone and the agent was able to identify that the issue was with the SIM card. The agent then offered to either send a new SIM card to the customer or have them come into one of their stores to replace it. The customer chose to have the new SIM card sent, which should arrive within 3-5 business days. The agent then provided instructions for activating the phone once they received the SIM card.
